metadata.title: Can an RZ/A1H microprocessor be shared by USB-connected hosts or devices?

sections.content:
Question:
Can an RZ/A1H microprocessor operate with two USB-connected hosts or devices?
Are channels 0 and 1 concurrently available to hosts or devices? 
Answer:
Yes. A separate host or device can be used with each channel.
Suitable Products
RZ/A1H
